text:
TheLadders.

On site in NYC.

Looking for great developers in general but right now our #1 areas of concern are people who posses some or all of the following: iOS, Android and JavaScript skills.

We are looking for graphic designers, interface architects, "backend" engineers, ops, data science, product management and more.

If you're good at what you do, we'd love to talk.

email me at sallen@theladders.com with questions or what not.
